name: khoaugment-pos
description: Hệ thống quản lý bán hàng thông minh cho doanh nghiệp Việt Nam

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy frontend/dist --project-name=vietnamese-pos-frontend
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:backend:staging && npm run deploy:frontend:staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:backend:production && npm run deploy:frontend:production
scripts.deploy:frontend:staging: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy frontend/dist --project-name=vietnamese-pos-frontend-staging
scripts.deploy:frontend:production: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy frontend/dist --project-name=vietnamese-pos-frontend --env production
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:shared
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared

author: KhoAugment Team

hooks.pre-push: npm run type-check && npm run test
